Title: Stunning!
ReviewText: Honestly I really like this product. She is PIGMENTED. The packaging is stunning and minimal. Such a luxurious color, feel, and finish. I think the shade range is really beautiful. Excellent product and excellent company. Gifted by rare beauty.

I have always loved rare beauty and I am so happy they came out with the illuminating blush. I have always loved shiny blushes and the way it radiants the glow is so beautiful. They knew what they did with this products. It was gifted by rare beauty for me and I am thankful for it.

The blush color is absolutely stunning! It gives a nice peachy bronze to the face and it blends beautifully. A little goes a long way so you can definitely get your money out of it. Gifted by rare beauty for my honest review

Title: BLENDS SO PERFECTLY
ReviewText: This blush blends out so well. You can wear it with the liquid blush and mix and the match shades. Or wear alone.

I am impress with how pigmented and glow this product is. I have received so many compliments on my makeup due to this product. The application was very easy to apply. The color is beautiful and it compliments my skin tone. Gifted by rare beauty

Title: The prettiest powdered glowy blush
ReviewText: I was gifted by Rare Beauty! This is my first rare beauty product I ever tried and was not disappointed at all! I was so happy that it’s just as gorgeous as it is online! I have never had a blush give so much glow! I also have dry textured skin and doesn’t bring up my texture at all!

Gifted by Rare Beauty. This pressed powder blush is a must-have! It's smooth, weightless, and gives your skin a radiant flush that looks like it's glowing from within. Plus, it's cruelty-free and free of all those nasty ingredients. Applying it is a breeze – just swipe it on evenly for instant luminosity. Trust me, you'll love the natural dimension it adds to your look.

Title: Do not drop.
ReviewText: The colour of this is so pretty but DO NOT DROP IT. Mine absolutely exploded two days after I bought it. I’m sad to say it because I love the Rare brand but I’ll stick with the Fenty killawatt highlighter instead.

Title: Go-to this Summer
ReviewText: Swatched these in store and found that Cheer and Joy barely showed on my skin (light medium, neutral). But Happy looked gorgeous! Bought it, put it on my face and it’s *perfect*!

Title: Need.
ReviewText: I am absolutely obsessed with this product!! The shimmer on this is the perfect amount without making it too crazy! It sits so perfectly on my skin and on top of my foundation. The pigment is chefs kiss Gifted by rare beauty!

Title: MUST HAVE
ReviewText: I am OBSESSED WITH THIS STUFF! I thought I loved the liquid blush but this on top of the liquid is chefs kiss. The pigment is so perfect and sparkly. I highly recommend getting this product. Apart of my everyday routine now! Gifted by rare beauty!!

I was gifted by rarebeauty and am absolutely OBSESSED. I’ve loved the rare beauty liquid blush for so long and this is the perfect powder plush to set it with!!! Joy is the most perfect coral color. You need to try if you want the most perfect color and glow!

Title: Love !
ReviewText: I love this blush! It applies so easy! I got shade joy! A little goes a long way this shade is perfect for summer! I usually build it up with the liquid blush in shade joy! I never owned anything from rare beauty until now and I can say I will be repurchasing in the future! Gifted by rare beauty 🫶🏼

I received this complimentary from Rare Beauty.  This blush is absolutely gorgeous. I love that I can use it alone, or add it on top of a another blush for some extra radiance. I was worried that it might not look good on my mature skin, but it did not highlight any imperfections. A little goes a long way!

This product has shimmer pearls in it for a shimmer finish. So this is not for users who prefer a matte finish. I do like the light compact and they have a great mission of helping others. Offered by Rare Beauty.

This blush has flecks of something in it, so it is sort of shimmery/sparkly and not matte. Just fyi for people who have a preference for one over the other! Otherwise, it is a nice little blush. Gifted by Rare Beauty.

Title: Very pigmented with a gorgeous glowy finish!
ReviewText: This is the prettiest blush formula that I’ve tried. I love this new innovation where it’s pigmented but also has a gorgeous glow, I don’t even need highlighter when using this new formula. I can’t wait to pick up more shades! Gifted by Rare Beauty.

Title: An amazing highlighted blush
ReviewText: I was scared that this would be either too much blush or too much highlighter but this product has a nice mix of both that doesn’t overpower the other.

Title: You need this!!!!
ReviewText: This lunch was gifted by rarebeauty and I wasn’t sure if I was going to absolutely love this blush, mostly because I have textured skin, but I was 100% wrong! This blush is absolutely gorgeous and does not emphasize texture a whole bunch. With oily acne prone skin, I thought it might be too shiny looking, but it gives your cheeks an inner glow. Absolutely love and would 100% recommend! I’ve been wearing this everyday since.

Title: Gorgeous
ReviewText: This is the most stunning blush. I’ve had it for about two weeks now and I’ve used it everyday. Cheer is the prettiest pink color and I love that the blush has a little highlight effect to it. I feel like I don’t ever need highlighter when I use this blush. I love it so much!

Title: Selena… you’ve done it again! <3
ReviewText: Oh my gosh… we all know HOW incredible Selena Gomez’s brand rare beauty is. This blush is seriously INCREDIBLE and totally a part of my everyday routine. I got the color in cheer which is Selena’s shade! I have a more medium neutral skin tone and it perfectly matches my cheeks! It’s a beautiful pink blush color and I love it! It’s pigmented so just use a little on your brush! Gifted by rarebeauty!

I’m obsessed with this new powder blush! It’s very pigmented and gives your cheeks the perfect glow. I’ve applied it using my fingers and a blush brush as well. I’ve also used it as a topper after applying the liquid blush. Gifted by rarebeauty

Title: Absolutely stunning
ReviewText: THIS BLUSH IS AMAZING! Rare beauty has taken the cake for my favorite blushing products and this one is just so gorgeous! it’s like a highlight and a blush in one. It’s stunning and gives a lot of smoothness to the skin. It’s very pigmented so a little goes a long way! highly recommend! I was gifted by rare beauty for my review

Title: New favorite blush!
ReviewText: This is my new favorite powder blush! I got the shade Joy and it’s absolutely perfect for my light neutral olive undertone! It’s sooo soft and beautiful on the skin, looks luminous without any sparkly texture which I love! Offered by Rare Beauty.

I was gifted soft pinch powder joy complimentary from rarebeauty. The powder blush has a silky feel and sets nicely on the skin but I like the liquid blush better. I felt that this powder blush is not long lasting.

Title: Did Not Emphasize Pores or Texture
ReviewText: The shade Joy is top notch! I was a bit afraid that these blushes would be too highlighty, but the shade Joy specifically is beautiful! She pairs so well with the liquid sister version! I like to start off with a little and then build up to the intensity I like. Joy is such a universally flattering shade, I believe it’ll look stunning on so many skin tones. Especially during these spring and summer months. I have large pores and texture, and this blush did not emphasize any of that! Gifted by RareBeauty.

Title: Broke in less then a week
ReviewText: I loved this blush for the first few days until I flew with it and it broke. I also had glass in my suitcase that held up so it wasn’t from them handling it too roughly. Super disappointed.

I’m usually not a big powder blush fan but this one is gorgeous and so natural looking / easy to apply, it really exceeded my expectations! The color joy is pretty peach great for summer. Gifted by rare beauty.

Title: My New Favorite Blush
ReviewText: This is the best product I have ever tried, Rare Beauty did it again. This is literally 2 products in 1 and its just beautiful on the skin. This is my new favorite Blush and The shade JOY is epic! Im obsessed!  -Gifted by Rare Beauty

Title: SO Good
ReviewText: I LOVE IT it’s gorgeous and blends so nice!!! it looks so pretty on and i get so many compliments

Title: Joy
ReviewText: Wow! This blush is so stunning. I got the color Joy and it has a beautiful coral/rose gold sheen to it. I have neutral undertones and a light Asian skin tone. I apply the liquid blush first- then use setting powder then apply the powder blush on top and it makes a beautiful combo!  There is so much product in this pan too, it’s going to last me a really long time. I had the best luck using a blush brush. This was gifted to me by Rare Beauty

Title: The Color is INSANE!
ReviewText:
This powder blush is soooo pretty, I'm actually obsessed. I already love my liquid blush, but I have always been a powder girl at heart. I was amazed at the pigment and shine that this blush gave. It added a really pretty soft pink hue that lasted the entire day. I would definitely rebuy! 

Gifted by rarebeauty, but it's my honest review!

Title: My fav blush all time of the year!
ReviewText: The soft pinch powder blush is my absolute favorite a little bit goes along way in the best way possible so you get what you’re paying for, my favorite is pairing it with the soft pinch liquid blush. I was so thankful to be gifted by rarebeauty.
Literally feels like silk, not as pigmented as I expected when applied with a brush but probably for the best.  Looks great with the Sephora fair contour.

Title: Beautiful
ReviewText: Beautiful. I love layering this on top of the liquid blush, it’s so pigmented it barely takes any product but it gives such a gorgeous color and shine it kind of serves as a highlighter too. Truly love it. Gifted by rarebeauty!

Title: Color that lasts all day
ReviewText: I love this light weight blush! The color is rich and lasts all day. It is easy to blend and a little goes a long way. I lightly tap it on my cheeks when smiling and continue to dab until I have achieved the look I am going for.  Gifted by Rarebeauty

Title: Stunning
ReviewText: Stunning! A beautiful topper to put on top of a dewy blush to make your cheeks pop. It’s not my favorite blush in the entire world, but it’s still great!

Title: Nice natural finish
ReviewText:
I have the same color of this blush in two versions, dry one and liquid. Honestly i do prefer the powder one because for me it’s easier to blend in on top of the make up. But i feel like for day when i don’t wear make up, the liquid formula is better. 
Both are pigmented and stay long on face. 
Gifted by rarebeauty

Title: SO PRETTY
ReviewText: i’m so in looooveeee with the new glowy blush!! she’s very pigmented and sparkly and layers so cute with the liquid blush. i’m very much loving these for a glowy look this spring or summer. I also love the packaging. gifted by rare beauty.
Broke it the day I got it to fragile but pretty don’t drop it

Title: Perfect for Spring!
ReviewText: I love Rare beauty liquid blushes and this was my first time trying the powder formula. Gifted by rare beauty, this product is smooth and beautiful! The formula is insanely nice and it makes my skin glow! Definitely will be buying more of the powder blushes!

Title: Amazing powder blush
ReviewText: This blush was gifted by rare beauty! It’s a gorgeous coral color that has the pigment you love and expect from rare beauty. This was my first experience with their powder blush and it is sooo pretty, I love the iridescence.

Title: Love it
ReviewText: Gifted by rarebeauty: The pigment on this blush is AMAZING. It’s so colorful and it really complements my skin tone, giving my face a nice glow. My new every day blush! Super easy to apply, I don’t even need a makeup brush.

Title: Love this blush
ReviewText: Rare Beauty generously gifted me the Soft Pinch Luminous Powder Blush in "Joy," and it swiftly secured its place as an essential in my makeup regimen. The "Joy" shade imparts a gentle, radiant sheen, instantly enlivening my complexion. Its finely milled formula effortlessly glides onto my skin, seamlessly blending for a natural appearance. Whether I opt for a minimalistic approach or aim for a more glamorous look, this blush offers customizable coverage that lasts throughout the day. Overall, Rare Beauty once again impresses with a premium product that infuses my everyday makeup routine with happiness and luminosity.
I love this product, it’s a beautiful color and gives a nice glow!

This was gifted to me by Rare Beauty and I am obsessed!!! If my olive toned girlies are looking for the perfect spring orangey shade. The luminious touch plus the rare beauty highlighter on top takes you to a whole other level of GLOWY!

Title: Luminous Blush
ReviewText: Happy I got to try Soft Pinch in the shade of Truth. I love that it’s compact easy to grab and go. Silky powder blush is so luminous, it’s airy, blendable and pigmented. It’s like having a blush and highlighter in one! I would it in different shades I definitely recommend! Gifted by Rarebeauty.

Title: Love this color
ReviewText: I received this product complimentary from the company rare beauty. I love the powder blush for a day look or a natural day. However if you mix the liquid blush and powder blush it leaves such a beautiful finish.

I was gifted by Rare Beauty and was so excited to try. Rare Beauty makes such good products and I love the reasoning behind the brand. This product is stunning. I love the variety of shades. Rare Beauty slays everytime!

Title: So great for a night out!
ReviewText: I received this product gifted by Rare Beauty but as an existing fan of the brand I was not surprised to find out I absolutely love this new blush/highlighter hybrid. It’s the perfect blush for a night out or when I need to look extra glam for an event!

Title: Perfect Shimmer & Shine
ReviewText: RareBeauty gifted me the shade "Joy" and I’ve paired it with the liquid blush for the BEST peach toned combo. I’m in love with the pigmentation and coverage of the product. The shimmer lasts all day without the 2016 gleam.

Title: The best blush I’ve ever used
ReviewText: This blush is INSANELY good! Literally a cross between a blush and a highlighter. Doesn’t get much better than that! It’s also so pigmented which is a plus. I received this product offered by rarebeauty but absolutely purchased again!

Title: New Girl in the Routine
ReviewText: RareBeauty gifted me this blush and I’m in LOVE. It gives the most gorgeous dew and shimmer without the annoying glitter specs. The color is stunning and I love the way it melts directly into your skin. I’ve been using it everyday!

Omg I’ve been such a big fan of rare beauty products and this blew me away!! I love using it on top of the liquid blush to “set it” and this gives a beautiful color on top of it and adds a gorgeous luminous glow and shimmer! It’s super pigmented. Gifted by rarebeauty

Gifted by rarebeauty It’s exactly what I expected. It looks amazing on my face. Just love this blush! Goes a long way and it doesn't take much to get that perfect cheeky blush. It will last me a long time. Also this shade Joy looks very natural. Very happy with it

Title: A must have !!
ReviewText: Gifted by rare beauty- this is Amazing !!!!! It can’t get any better! The color and the highlight all in one is a game changer ! Goes on easy and looks beautiful! You can’t go wrong with any color they are all prettier than the next! This is my new favorite

Title: Perfect!
ReviewText: I love these new Rare blushes! I love the liquid formula and it’s so fun they came out with these just in time for spring and summer! That extra oomph you would want for your makeup! I love using it as a blush topper the most this shade and Joy are my fave! I was gifted by rare beauty

I love Rare Beauty liquid blushes! Joy is one of the best shades for these! I love the packaging and a lot of the shades! This new blush is a great blush topper or on its own! It’s super pigmented but I love the effect it has as a topper the most! So pretty and has elevated my makeup and is perfect for summer! I was gifted by rare beauty

Title: Beautiful blush
ReviewText: I love this blush! I love the subtle glow that this has! I got the shade joy which his beautiful if you want a sunkissed look. I love that this blush does not accentuate the texture of my skin like other powders do. Gifted by rarebeauty

Such a beautiful glowing blush that is pigmented but still packs a punch on the overall luminosity. I put this on over my rare liquid blush and I get so many compliments on my blush and complexion! Gifted by Rare Beauty

Title: glowy blush
ReviewText: This is such a beautiful glowy powder blush. I love the peachy color. It doesn't look glittery on the cheeks just glowy like a highlighter. It also looks beautiful on top of Joy liquid blush or any blush to make it as a blush topper. No highlighter needed. Gifted by rare beauty

Title: Loving it
ReviewText: That’s the beautiful blush I have ever seen, it’s such a wonderful flush of color, the color looks wonderful for all skin types and skin color. Loving the texture and loving the results. Thanks for making such products, gifted by rare beauty.

This is my new favorite powder blush. I love using it to really set in the liquid blush and bring the beautiful sun kissed color out even more. It is perfectly pigmented and very blendable. I also like how the powder has a slight shimmer you giving a nice highlight. gifted by rarebeauty

Title: Cheer
ReviewText: It’s a pretty colour, however it is so sparkly you look like a disco ball. Not wearable for me

Title: Blush disappears
ReviewText: I was so excited to purchase this colour specifically but I find it doesn’t suit my skin tone (I’m neutral fair) and it disappears after an hour. I’ll keep it to use more as a blush topper but I won’t purchase more shades.

I love a glowy look and wanted to love this product, but I feel like this type of blush is more suited for people who don’t have textured skin. Pairing it with the liquid blush didn’t particularly make me love it any more :( This was gifted to me by Rare Beauty.

I love this powder blush in the shade "Joy." It is perfect for summer time, especially when I'm tan, and has a great shimmer to it. I have already gotten so many compliments on it. Gifted by Rare Beauty

I LOVE this blush! I have the shade "cheer" and always get compliments. It is pigmented and shows up beautifully while also adding a little shimmer. I would definitely recommend it! Gifted by Rare Beauty

Title: A gorgeous luminous blush!!
ReviewText: I’m in love with this blush. Truly. It’s so pretty and leaves the most luminous finish. I actually really love it on its own but also pairing it on top of the liquid blushes as a blush topper. Hope is such a gorgeous soft shade I’m so happy Rare released powder blushes! Gifted by Rare Beauty

I got both Luminous Powder Blush and the Soft Pinch Liquid Blush in the shade Joy. The powder blush has more orange tint to it, despite sharing the same color name and that is why I prefer the liquid version, because it leans more towards a pinkish tone. Both are very pigmented

Title: Beautiful!
ReviewText: I love this blush! I’m a big time blush girl and the added shimmer in this is amazinggg! It blends out beautifully and sits on the skin really well. Will definitely have to look into getting more shades! (This product was gifted to me)

Title: LOVE!! 🧡
ReviewText: I absolutely cannot recommend this new Rare Beauty blush enough. It is so blendable, with buildable coverage. The color is so stunning as well!! The blush truly is the perfect mix of glow and liquid blush!! gifted by rarebeauty

Title: Love it!
ReviewText: This product was gifted to me by rare beauty in exchange for a review. This is a beautiful blush! The shade is lighter in the bottle but it blends so well on my skin and looks so pretty! I would definitely recommend this shade for darker skin tones as well.

love this blush so much! the color is absolutely gorgeous and is so flattering on the skin! I love how glowy this makes me look. it also doesn’t bother my sensitive skin! definitely a must have blush! gifted by rare beauty!

I really love the color payoff of these. The color itself is beautiful.  It is easy to build without being too heavy. I will say these are super fragile. They will break or crack if you look at them wrong gifted by rare beauty

Title: Natural and glowy!
ReviewText: I was gifted by Rare Beauty their new Soft Pinch Luminous Powder Blush and it has become a radiant addition to any makeup collection, offering a blendable formula that delivers a natural, lit-from-within glow. As a makeup enthusiast, I was eager to put this product to the test, and it did not disappoint!

Title: So pretty
ReviewText: Rare Beauty gifted me this blush. It has a wonderful subtle shine. I like to apply it with a very fluffy brush and I will apply it more often if necessary, little by little, until it reaches the intensity I want. I love the glow it leaves on the skin. the packaging is beautiful. On my skin this blush looks so beautiful.

Title: love this for the summer
ReviewText: I love love this powder blush, the pigment and color are amazing. I love the subtle glow it gives and not very overwhelming and you’re able to build if you want more blush. This was gifted by rare beauty and I’m so thankful to be able to try it!

Gifted by Rare Beauty the duo of shade Joy in the luminous Powder blush and the liquid. I do Really love these two together and think the liquid provides a nice base and barrier for the powder to not emphasize texture. It also helps it stay put. Beautiful shade!

Title: Love it!
ReviewText: These era luminous blushes are the perfect combination we have all been waiting for. And it was worth the wait because they are beautiful. Joy is a very pretty and vibrant peach shade, with a beautiful luminous finish. perfect for summer. Gifted by Rare Beauty.

Gifted by Rare Beauty shade Joy. I love The sheen and shin of this blush and feel like it does double duty for blush and highlight. It actually reminds me a bit of Milani baked blushes. I love This bright shade for spring and summer!

Title: Love!
ReviewText: I absolutely love this new blush so much and I am a huge fan of the shimmer as it leaves me with such a nice glow on the skin. It’s beautiful over a liquid blush or by itself 100%. gifted by rarebeauty.

Title: perfect addition just in time for summer
ReviewText: I am obsessed with anything Rare Beauty ! If you love a shimmery, glowy look - this product is for you ! These blushes are stunning ! Easy to blend and very buildable ! I was gifted by rare beauty and this product is the perfect addition to your makeup routine, just in time for summer !!!

Title: A new must have!!
ReviewText: Rare beauty’s new blush is absolutely amazing! It is the perfect mix of pigment with a luminous glow to it. Just like the liquid blush you only need a little bit to go a long way. They are very pigmented in the best way! Big fan of this new product!! Offered by rare beauty!

Title: New must have
ReviewText: This item was gifted by Skeepers. This product is amazing! As a new user of the brand, I have been impressed by the quality and versatility of this hybrid between Soft Pinch Liquid Blush and Positive Light Silky Touch Highlighter. The texture is smooth and lightweight, easy to apply, and provides a radiant, natural flush that lasts all day. Its high pigmentation and water resistance are incredible. Additionally, each powder is hand-polished, adding a unique touch. A unique beauty experience that I highly recommend!

I love the new rare beauty blush! I got this one in shade joy, the liquid blush is gorgeous! I plan to pair it with the luminous blushes which I love because the tiniest bit goes a long way, I’m never going to run out! Gifted by rare-beauty

Title: Glitter bomb
ReviewText: I was excited to get this shade Cheer but unfortunately it’s a total glitter bomb! Great purchase for a 12 year old but that’s about it. I purchased this, it was not sent to me, so this review is real.

Title: Love it!
ReviewText: I could finally try it and personally, I love the powered blush! 💕 such an amazing soft color with glitter ☺️ it blends super good in the skin and leaves an appearance of tone+glitter+red cheeks, just an amazing option! Gifted by rare beauty

Title: Love!
ReviewText: Im loving this blush and shade! This product is so easy to apply and the color is so beautiful. I love the glowy look on my skin, it’s perfect for that glowy clean girl look for the summer! This product was gifted to me by Rare Beauty

Title: So amazing
ReviewText: This formula is jaw dropping, it is the perfect 2 in one it leaves your skin looking so glowy but is so flattering. The pigment is beautiful you need this in your makeup collection im suprised on how good this is. Gifted by rare beauty

Title: Love it!
ReviewText: Omg, I’m obsessed with this blush! I’m a huge fan of Rare beauty and their blushes and this one is just amazing! The glowing look is so beautiful and it’s like the perfect amount of blush and glow. My new go to! This product was gifted to me by rare beauty

This blush was gifted by rare beauty. It blends in so nicely with my skin giving it a coral hue. It gives me the perfect sun kissed tint as if I’ve been lying on the beach all day. This is a definite staple in my makeup routine and I will be repurchasing! This is a must-purchase!

Title: Definitely a go to now!
ReviewText: This is definitely worth the hype! I love how pigmented the colors are & how well it blends. It’s super easy to build on top of but easier to get carried away! lol you get so much product too for the price! I’m in love gifted by rarebeauty such a cute color too!

when i saw that rare beauty was coming out with powder blushes, i knew i had to try them. these are gorgeous!! a little goes a long way and i just build it up when i want more color but one layer's usually enough. it has a nice glowy luminous finish which i love. disclaimer: i received this complimentary from rare beauty.

Title: A must have combo with blush and highlighter
ReviewText: The luminous blush is amazing I got the shade in joy it gives an amazing shine and glow with that beautiful coral color I’m obsessed it blends so nicely as well definitely would recommend “ gifted by rare beauty”

Title: Wouldn’t recommend
ReviewText: I really wanted to love this but there’s just no way. After spending 45 minutes on my base I went to put this on and it just started creating bald spots on my cheeks, in the other spaces it was extremely muddy and I hate returning makeup but this is just a serious no. unblendable.

Title: So good
ReviewText: This was offered by rare beauty. This new blush is the perfect hybrid of their liquid blush and highlighters. It gives the same strobing effect. And it is extremely pigmented and buildabe! Great for mature skin

These are my favorite brand of blushes. They are so pigmented and last so long on the face. They apply best with a sponge in my opinion. I love the range of colors! Definitely a staple in my makeup routine. Gifted by rare beauty

Title: Pretty!
ReviewText: This is so pretty! It’s just a soft blush and I love the combination of highlighter and the original liquid blush colors. It can either be sheer or built up for more color and glow. Gifted by Rare Beautytt

Title: The best
ReviewText: Gifted by rare beauty, and here is my honest review, This is one of my all-time favorite blushes, and I will continue to invest into this brand as they have an invested into me, in terms of giving me the quality that I expect as a customer, and then exceeding that

Title: LOVE
ReviewText: This blush is so nice! I absolutely love the shade! It’s so pretty and sparkly and adds such a nice glow to the cheeks! It is highly pigmented and a little goes a long way. I will definitely be using this in my routine. Gifted by Rare Beauty

Title: Stunning!!
ReviewText: Rare Beauty has done it again! This product is stunning. I love how pigmented and luminous this product. The color is gorgeous and I love the extra glow it provides my skin. I was gifted by Rare Beauty.

Title: So nice!
ReviewText: I love this blush! The color is super cute and I love the shimmer in the blush! The texture is silky smooth and a little bit goes a long way! I love how pigmented it is and it applies easily! Gifted by Rare Beauty

This liquid blush is absolutely perfect and stunning on my skin tone. Due to the perfect color and long lasting pigment, this has become a staple in my everyday routine. I love how buildable it is. I wear it both over makeup and simply sunscreen. I was gifted by Rare Beauty

Title: So good!!
ReviewText: I really love the color payoff of this blush! It blends seamlessly into my cheeks and looks like I have been out in the sun for a little while! I have received so many compliments while wearing it as well! Gifted by rare beauty

This blush was gifted by Rare Beauty in exchange for my honest review. It really makes sense for rare beauty’s line. It’s definitely VERY luminous so it probably won’t be best for more mature or textured skin. It’s really pretty but I tend to use it more as a blush topper than a full blush.

Title: Perfect bronzy peach
ReviewText: This is such a gorgeous bronzy peach with just the right amount of shimmer to give me the best summer vibes! Not for the faint of heart because it is very sparkly! It is pretty pigmented too so you don’t need to work to build it up. Gifted by rare beauty

Title: A very happy surprise!
ReviewText: I never use highlighter because I think it just highlights the texture, but I love this blush  it's the best of both worlds  blush and highlighter!

Title: new favorite
ReviewText: I have both the powder and liquid blush & I cannot decide which one I love more. This blush is not the one I reach for. It builds really well and is such a flattering color. I’ve been using it for a while now and I haven’t notice any breakouts in my face from it. I really love this blush offered by rarebeaury & will get it again.

Title: Shimmery
ReviewText: I got this in the shade joy which is a really nice pinkish color and really shimmery I usually do not like shimmer but this is nice I probably wouldn’t use as much as I first did it’s like a blush highlighter Into one I did receive gifted by rarebeauty

Title: Wish i could’ve loved this
ReviewText: Really really wanted to love this since i love the liquid blush and highlight separately but this ended up breaking me out into tiny clusters of bumps all over the areas I applied it! I was so sad because the color was beautiful but it wasn’t working for my skin. This was gifted by rare beauty.

Love thiss blush!! Such a beautiful powder blush! I also love how they made it with a little bit of a highlight! It’s great to wear alone or to set their liquid blush!! I was gifted by rarebeauty! Over all so good!!

Gifted by Rarebeauty and I’m a brown skin girly and Joy looks so good ! It is so glowy, but not glittery! On top on the Joy liquid blush it is chef’s kiss. However this is beautiful on its own. It also blends seamlessly into her skin!

The finely-milled formula blends effortlessly onto the skin, providing a subtle yet radiant pop of color. The shade Joy is a beautiful peachy-pink tone that adds a healthy glow to the cheeks. With its buildable coverage and luminous finish, this blush is perfect for creating a natural, lit-from-within look. Whether you're aiming for a soft daytime glow or a more glamorous evening vibe, this blush is sure to become a staple in your collection. Gifted by Rarebeauty

Title: Sunkissed natural glow
ReviewText: Lighter and sparkly version of its liquid blush counterpart. Very soft to the touch with both fingers and brush but still pigmented with no fallout. Also lasts a very long time, i’ve noticed that it stains slightly which I personally like. Has the most beautiful pink and gold reflects to it, but looks dewy and leaves a natural glow to the skin when applied. It’s also unscented which is a huge plus for me personally and is in the cutest little packaging. I honestly love it and would purchase other shades with my own money in the future. (gifted by rarebeauty)

Title: Amazing product 🥰🥰
ReviewText: Gifted by rare beauty. This formula of the pigment of the liquid blushes and the shine of the highlighters is a bomb, it looks incredible on the skin, it gives that look of bright and healthy skin, I would buy it again

Title: new must have :)
ReviewText: Gifted by Rare Beauty. Hands down my FAVORITE powder blush. It is extremely pigmented, the color is BEAUTIFUL, and the color lasts all day.  a little bit also goes along way. highly recommend for anyone wanting to try :)

Title: One of the Kind Blush! So Creamy!
ReviewText: Simply amazing product!!! Love the finish and go on very easily. If you haven’t tried it, you are missing out!

Title: so glowy!!
ReviewText: I was super excited to try these luminous blushes, and they are DEFINITELY luminous. You don’t need a highlight when using these because they’re so shimmery and pretty! I’d say if you are not a glowy dewy girly definitely do not purchase, but if you’re into that, these are perfect for you. they last all day too and have great color pay off!! gifted by rare beauty all opinions are my own

Title: My new favorite Blush!
ReviewText: Once again, Rare Beauty never fails! This blush is basically a 2 in 1 product, you get the blush and highlighter for the perfect price. It gives you the perfect shimmer, a little goes a long way. I love the fact that it looks so natural, definitely recommend. Gifted by Rare Beauty

Title: LOVE
ReviewText: I’ve been using this blush a little over a week and I love it! You can build and really blend this product. It’s super easy to use and can have a natural or glam look depending on what mood you are in

Title: I love!
ReviewText: You need this blush! Rarebeauty products are truly the best. It goes so well over the liquid blush. The product is pigmented and easy to use. It lasted all day on my oily skin and looked beautiful in pictures. The packaging is also really nice. Gifted by rarebeauty in return for an honest review!

I was gifted by rare beauty and i am not disappointed. I love the color payoff, it is perfect for the warmer weather. Not to mention, her formula and ingredients list is amazing. Definitely recommend it

I really love rare beauty blushes and this new formula it’s incredible I think I gonna used it all summer, it gives you the best combination between blush and highlight!Love love love gifted by rarebeauty

Title: You won’t regret using this blush
ReviewText: Excuse me?? I am obsessed with this blush! This was gifted by rare beauty to me and OMG! The pigment it’s amazing and the shade it’s so perfect for my skin tone. I love a no-makeup look and this blush it’s so perfect for it since I’m not a fan of applying highlighter all the time. I can’t wait to use this product all summer long!!

Title: A MUST
ReviewText: This blush is BEAUTIFUL . The texture is everything and super silky just like the highlighter texture. It glides right on the skin. The peachy pigment is stunning and a little goes a really long way. Gifted by rare beauty

Title: Lovely
ReviewText: Love this formula so much it’s unique and different. Even though it was gifted by rarebeauty I am always honest and this formula is out of this world!!! If your looking for a glowy highlighter than doesn’t look textured this is perfect for you!

Title: Broken
ReviewText: Came completely broken, returning. Gorgeous shade otherwise

Title: So pretty but just as fragile 😭
ReviewText: So I first bought this on a Saturday, and as soon as I got home I found out that it had shattered in the bag but luckily I had the chance to go return in a few days later! It’s so pretty, but be careful because it breaks so easily! The same thing happened to me with the highlighter

Title: didn’t even get to wear it…
ReviewText: was super excited about this product and immediately got it when i saw it in the store when i was on spring break. i took it back to my apartment and it didn’t even survive the drive there! waste of money! :(

A nice luminous blush! While it looks similar to the highlight, the blush is much more sheer and gives more a sheen than a glitter look. The blush is amazing alone but also an amazing addition as a blush topper. Gifted by rarebeauty

Title: A must!
ReviewText: I got this blush and liquid blush combo gifted by Rare Beauty and you already know how awesome the liquid one is but this powder is absolutely beautiful. I love the shimmer and blush combination. The color is super pigmented and it lasts all day. If you need a shimmery highlighter blush this is the one to get!

Title: I love ittt!!
ReviewText: Rare beauty gifted me their soft, pinch powdered blush. I I don’t even know where to begin. This product is amazing. It has a really beautiful glow. It works well with other products and it’s really comfortable on the skin.

Title: Perf luminous blush
ReviewText: gifted by rare beauty- I love this product so much! Not only is it pigmented but its also 2 in 1. A perfect blush with a luminous shine for highlighting! A little goes a long way, and the top factor is that its super buildable!

Title: New fav product!
ReviewText: I was gifted by rarebeauty with the soft pinch liquid blush in the shade Joy, and I am absolutely obsessed! I don’t think I’ll ever leave the house without putting the slightest bit of blush on my face! It looks so natural and is perfect for everyday wear!

Title: Definitely a must have !
ReviewText: Rare beauty gifted me their soft, pinch powder blush. I absolutely love the formula a little bit goes a long way and it does not accentuate my texture. There’s shade in particular it’s so cute. I’ve gotten so many compliments already.

This blush is incredible! The shade is stunning, and it gives the skin a radiant glow. It's now one of my top makeup picks, especially for achieving that summer radiance. A must-have, gifted by Rare Beauty.

Title: Really Shimmery!
ReviewText: Not my favorite blush. I don’t really like using a glowy blush and this one has a bunch of glitter in it. I also found that it was hard to blend out. If you like a glowy blush I would recommend. (Gifted by Rare Beauty)

This is beautiful! It’s a cross between a highlight and a blush and it’s beautiful!! You only need a tiny bit on your brush because it’s so pigmented! It blends really nicely though and looks beautiful! It’s not glittery which is good and gives a good amount of shine!

Title: A must have in your makeup bag!!!
ReviewText: omggg this is beautiful love the color and blush and highlighter at the same time amazing it blends beautifully gives you such a glowy look would definitely recommend can’t wait to try all of the colors “gifted by rare beauty”

Title: Must try!!
ReviewText: this blush duo is incredible! first of all, happy might be my favorite shade from the entire line, so i love that i can have the powdered and liquid duo. the powder is such an incredible finish if you like a glowy look, but doesnt cross the line of feeling overly glittery. i highly recommend you try if youve been eyeing it. offered by rarebeauty

This blush is amazing and pigmented and works really well with my skin tone and likes. I have used it for a few days now and the color works well and is perfect for an everyday make up routine. Gifted by rare beauty.

I was gifted by rare beauty the blush in the shade Joy! At first It may seem like a very bright peachy tone but worked beautifully with my brown toned skin! I used It on top of the liquid blush in shade joy! It works great as a topper and alone!

Title: Beautiful
ReviewText: Gifted by rarebeauty. I have really enjoyed using this blush, as it leaves a beautiful shade of orange tone. I always lean more towards orange toned blushes and this one is to die for! Title: Joy!!!!
ReviewText: The most perfect product ever omg!!! Super happy with how glowy my skin looks after I apply this, I’ve been mixing it with the liquid blush under and it looks unreal Rare beauty, you’re amazing!!! (Product gifted by rarebeauty)

Title: Must Have
ReviewText: I was a little worried about trying this blush just because of how sparkly/glittery it is I thought it might look weird on my light skin tone….I was definitely wrong. This blush is GORGEOUS

ReviewText: Rare Beauty blushes are fantastic. They come in a wide range of shades for all skin tones. The formula is smooth and blends easily, giving you a natural flush of color. Title: It’s Glowy
ReviewText:
This powder blush is just so beautiful and glowy. I love how easy it is to apply and it’s such a buildable coverage. So you can do a light blush look or a bold blush look. Title: pleasantly surprised

Title: Definitely a must if you wear blush & Highlighter
ReviewText: Non Insensitive Review- I purchased two blushes the day they launched and I could not be happier with them. I am reading some of the reviews which states “not for every day use” or doesn’t last long- IMO these blushes are for every day use, if you wear highlighter and blush, these gems are for you. They do last a very long time. My makeup lasts all day long and then some. These blushes are absolutely stunning, the formula is soft and silky, It’s not a blush that you rub on your skin with a brush, you need to gently swipe. These are definitely worth the purchase, especially if you use blush and highlighter.

These blushes were amazing! So glowy and the pigment is insane. You don’t even need to use highlight because these blushes alone work the best. Never tried a rarebeauty blush before and I’m so glad I had The opportunity to do so. Literally gorgeous! Gifted by rarebeauty .

I really wanted to love this product, but unfortunately, I don't. I own three of the highlighters and absolutely love them, so I figured the blush has got to be amazing as well. well.......It happened again, I came home and opened Cheer, and it was already shattered into a million pieces. I'm familiar with this happening because it's already happened twice before with the highlighters. sorry to say, this time just ain't gonna cut it.

Gifted by rarebeauty. Loving this cute and pigmented color. Give an extra level of beauty. With its inclusive shade range and innovative formulas, this bundle is a must-have for every makeup enthusiast seeking beauty with a purpose.

Title: Love this!

Title: Will replace a highlighter in my routine
ReviewText: I’m very pale (VERY PALE) and I really don’t think it’s as pigmented as everyone else says, at least in the shade “cheer”! Love the subtle glow it gives! Will use it on top of my liquid blush cause again, I don’t find it as pigmented as everyone claims

Title: Gorgeous!!
ReviewText: The glow on this blush is unreal. I think it’s really hard to find a blush that looks almost irridescent and this blush does it perfectly. I really didn’t think they could do better than their liquid blush but this really is something else. The blush is shimmery but I love that it adds some more dimension to my face. The color joy is absolutely beautiful. For reference I have joy in the liquid version as well and it’s not as bright and a little more muted but it works really well with my tan skin. I will be purchasing these in the rest of the colors. I highly recommend. This was complimentary from rarebeauty

Title: For those who want bold colour and highlight
ReviewText: Loving it so far. The blush colour is pigmented and the highlight is strong. Not for people who want a subtle glow. Make sure to use a light hand and build in thin layers because it doesn’t blend well on application. It does melt into the skin beautifully throughout the day

ReviewText: Very pigmented blush, beautiful glow on the skin and lots of color as well, you kind of have to be light handed while applying. It is also a very delivate formula and it cracked when I swiped my blush brush across of it for the first time.. be aware.

This blush is gorgeous! It is the most beautiful glowy coral, and leaves a luxurious luminous glow on my cheeks. The texture is different - it is a powder but is creamy and bouncy at the same time. I love this pop of color and glow! It was gifted by rare beauty

Title: A blush that gives all the glow
ReviewText: I have VERY dry skin and I love this blush. The color joy is so beautiful. I tend to use a lot of cream products that I then set with powders. Adding this blush into my routine brings the glow back into my skin. It’s makes the finish more skin like. It’s a product you can continue to layer and it still feels so lightweight. It’s the perfect amount of pearl and pigment that diffuses so softly. Gifted by Rare Beauty.

For my review, the soft pinch powder blush was gifted by Rare Beauty. I love this blush's sleek, compact packaging, which makes it so easy to travel with! It also has a mirror, so you don’t need to carry another one! The blush is a very pigmented formula and allows for buildable coverage- you can use it to create a natural look or glam look based on the occasion. It has a beautiful silky, smooth texture that blends seamlessly onto the skin without feeling heavy or cakey, providing a natural-looking finish! It stayed on for an entire day without needing a refresh, which I love!

So disappointed came completely destroyed!

I find this adds the perfect sheen to the skin and makes me look glowy! I really like this one and think it would work for all skin types/looks.

Title: An almost obnoxious amount of glitter
ReviewText:
*Purchased myself 
Knowing how much I dislike the powder highlight, I shouldn't have purchased this blush but I took a chance and I regret it. Like the highlight, this blush so intensely glittery, almost obnoxiously so, that even with a light hand and buffing it into my skin, my cheeks are covered in sparkles. It emphasized pores and fine lines I don't even have. The shade Happy is light pink but warmer than the liquid blush version, with more "shine" than color as the pigmentation isn't very buildable...unless I wanted even more glitter on my face. 
Makeup is extremely subjective and clearly people love this but it's not for me. I'm already very fair, I don't need blush making me look like a Twilight vampire when I step into the sun.

Title: Rare beauty blush
ReviewText: The blush was cute. I don’t like shimmery products on the skin especially a powder. If you are into highlighters you’ll love it. The color is nice I just wish it was a matte blush. I was gifted by rare beauty in exchange for a review.

Title: So shimmery!
ReviewText: This is like a highlighter and blush in one product! I can use this powder blush on its own for a beautiful super glowy look! It looks like there’s a golden shine to it when the light reflects it. I also love using the liquid blush first, and then using the powder blush in the same shade on top of the liquid blush. It’s so pigmented and very lightweight too! The shade is beautiful to wear everyday! This was gifted by Rare beauty.

Title: Sadly it's a No
ReviewText: I'm so disappointed because I wanted to love this so much! It sits weird on the skin I don't know how to explain it...I tried Cheer and Happy and I can't make it work. Too shimmery not enough pigment maybe? I will return them sadly ☹️

Title: Not for me
ReviewText: Doesn’t look pretty. Looks cartoonish and not for everyday use.

Title: Disappointing
ReviewText: So disappointed with this blush! :( wears kind of like kids makeup or a Halloween feel. The consistency is very dusty and light so felt like it just kind of came off after an hour. Overall felt cheap and will have to return. Big fan of her other products but think this was a big miss unfortunately

Title: A-Ma-Zing
ReviewText: This product is great! I got it as an easter gift and it stays on all day, an easy put on, the perfect size, and has great pigment! I really recommend!

For a powdered blush a little still goes a long way for this product! It leaves you with such a beautiful glow so you don’t need to add highlighter afterward which is so nice. I also really loved how it was buildable and easy to blend! offered by rare beauty

If you want a blush that makes you SUPER glowy this is it! I love that it’s a blend between a blush and a highlighter because it gives you an amazing glow without having to add highlighter on top of it. The color is also super a beautiful delicate pink! offered by rare beauty

Title: Junk. Don't buy waste of money
ReviewText: ￼ I don't know how the splash got such great reviews because it's pure trash. It doesn't even last an hour on the face with a primer and a wall. I bought a flat five in them. They're all going back. Sorry Selena your make up is trash.

Title: Broken
ReviewText: Came completely broken. I was looking forward to it as well. So disappointed.

Title: A must!
ReviewText: The Soft Pinch Blush in shade Joy is now a staple in my makeup routine! I was gifted by rare beauty and already obsessed. The coral shade gives such a nice natural Sunkissed look that I have been looking for. It applies so beautifully and gives such a pop! I love this shade!

I do have a bit of texture on my cheeks which is slightly emphasized but that’s to be expected with this type of product. Such a gorgeous blush! Gifted by Rare Beauty.

This project was gifted by rarebeauty in exchange for my honest review. The powder is really soft and doesn't have a lot of fall out. Unfortunately this didnt' work for me as it didn't blend well and emphasized my pores.

This project was gifted by rarebeauty in exchange for my honest review. I didn't love or hate this product. It looked overly shiny, didn't blend as well into my skin and really sat into my pores.  On the plus side, the powder is really soft and the packaging is nice.

Title: I need every shade
ReviewText: #gifted_by_RareBeauty I was gifted these products to provide my honest review on them. Overall, I found that Rare Beauty's Soft Pinch Powder and Liquid Blush in the shade Joy are the ultimate duo for long-lasting blush. It was so pigmented that the product would end up lasting me a few months. They blended out seamlessly with a brush, beauty blender, or simply my finger. I found that if there was too much pigment, I would take a damp beauty blender and lightly pat the area until it was diffused to my liking. I'm happy I went with a darker shade because it looks stunning with a bronzer laid underneath. I will definitely be buying these in more shades!

I was super excited to see Rare Beauty launch a powder blush! This is more of a blush topper - it’s not super pigmented on its own. It’s more glowy / shimmery like a highlighter. It looks great paired with the Rare Beauty liquid blush! Gifted by Rare Beauty.

Title: Get it now
ReviewText: So pretty. Color and highlights in one swipe. Just so beautiful. Going to try another color

Title: so pretty!
ReviewText: This is such a unique blush!! It acts like blush and highlighter in one so perfect for a quick makeup look. I got the peachy shade joy which is perfect for warm and neutral skin tones. Gifted by rare beauty but the love is all my own.

I’m definitely getting more shades of this blush! *Gifted by rarebeauty*

ReviewText: Beautiful glowy highlighting blush. I don’t usually go for powders as much because I have drier skin, but the shine and texture of this one works for me and also layers well with more natural finish cream blushes. Lasting power and pigmentation seems pretty good and it doesn’t accentuate my texture, though I do have smaller pores in that area of my face. Gifted by Rare Beauty

ReviewText: I have ordered this product twice from Sephora.  Unfortunately, both times, it arrived cracked and broken into a powdery consistency.  It simply cannot be shipped with paper and expect it to arrive intact.  It's unfortunate because I think I would really love it.

Title: Love it
ReviewText: Such a beautiful and light color. Easy to build up and with the most beautiful hint of sparkle. I received this via mail and it came perfectly in tact!!

Title: Love it!!

Title: Great as long as you know what you’re getting
ReviewText: Gifted by Rare Beauty in exchange for my review. I think there's some important things to consider about this product if you're debating picking it up. I would describe these more as a blush-highlighter hybrid, leaning more toward being a highlight. Essentially, if you've tried their powder highlighters, these are them but just with blush pigments added to them. The shimmers in these are visible on the skin, especially in direct sunlight so if that's not your vibe you should skip these for now.

This is gorgeous ! It is way more pigmented than I expected , so start off with a light hand ! I like using it on top of the liquid blush for more color. It gives a great illuminating glow to the cheeks and lasted all day with little fade ! The lighter shades are definitely more of a highlighter than a blush, which is why I recommend using over liquid / cream blush.

Title: Luminous with a bit of sparkle
ReviewText: I bought this in Cheer and Hope. I have light skin with yellow undertones, and Cheer looks peach and Hope a warm neutral. Both shades are beautiful with just a bit of sparkle. I’m 45 so generally shy away from glitter on my face. This blush/highlighter combo is just right

Title: So smooth and buttery!
ReviewText: I was sooo stoked about getting my hands on this! Beautiful texture and the powder is so fine!!! Tbh it reminds me of a more expensive luxury highlighter blush that i own. I got the shade Joy and it is very pigmented so i would suggest using a fluffy brush if you want to slowly build it up. Gifted by Rare Beauty

This powder blush is the most beautiful blush I have ever tried. It gives the most beautiful glow and color I have ever seen in a formula. Rare. Beauty is the absolute best. I definitely think everyone should try it. Gifted by rarebeauty.

Title: LOVEEE

Pleasantly surprised that the powder blushes actually perform even better. I bought Happy and Joy, and Happy is amazing. Haven’t tested Joy yet but I’m sure it’s good too. Anywho happy is the perfect pink. Not too blue in the base and just warm enough to give me the perfect pink that I have been looking for.

Title: Love
ReviewText: Pretty and very glowy. Some people won't love these because they dislike metallic blushes, but they're stunning. I had a hard time picking a shade to start off with, and chose Hope. To me it's the most neutral of the range. By no means is it a wallflower shade, though. This is beautiful. Sheer enough, but buildable. Just as soft as the highlighter powders. Title: Huh?

Title: Obsessed with these blushes

This product did not disappoint, it has the pigment, color, and lasting effects. There wasn’t too much fall out from the product which is a nice plus. Title: Love this new blush
ReviewText: Rare Beauty's powder blush in the shade "Joy" is an absolute game-changer for adding a healthy, natural flush to the cheeks. "Joy" is a versatile shade that compliments a wide range of skin tones, providing just the right amount of warmth to brighten up your complexion. Its lasting power is impressive, staying vibrant and fresh throughout the day without any need for touch-ups. This blush has quickly become a staple in my makeup routine, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking to elevate their blush game. complimentary from rarebeauty

Title: Loveeeeee
ReviewText: The Rare Beauty Luminous Blush in Joy, offered by Rare Beauty, is a delightful addition to any makeup collection. This product effortlessly combines a silky texture with a luminous finish, delivering a natural and radiant glow to the cheeks. One of the standout features of this blush is its buildable formula, allowing for customizable intensity from a subtle flush to a more intense pop of color. The shade "Joy" is particularly flattering, offering a warm peachy-pink hue that complements a wide range of skin tones.The blush blends seamlessly into the skin, thanks to its lightweight and blendable consistency, making application a breeze. Whether applied with fingers, a brush, or a sponge, the result is a dewy and fresh complexion that lasts throughout the day.Moreover, the packaging is sleek and portable, making it convenient for on-the-go touch-ups. The inclusion of a mirror adds to its practicality, perfect for quick makeup checks. Overall, the Rare Beauty Luminous Blush in Joy is a must-have for those seeking a luminous and long-lasting blush that enhances natural beauty effortlessly.

I received this product complimentary from Rare Beauty in exchange for my honest review. I was worried this blush would be too glowy for my textured, acne-prone skin. However I find the best way for me to use this is to apply it on my cheekbones rather than over the pores on the apples of my cheeks. I also like to tap over the blush with a sponge to take down some of the shine. This blush is truly stunning and doesn’t overly emphasize texture. However if you apply it over pores, it will definitely make them more noticeable. I also appreciate that there isn’t any glitter in the blush.

Title: Stunning shade and shine
ReviewText: Gifted by Rare Beauty this Soft Pinch Luminous Powder Blush is a game-changer in my makeup routine. Its seamless blendability and weightless feel create a natural, radiant glow that lasts all day. The highly pigmented formula adds dimension without flaking or caking. I love that its transfer-proof, smudge-proof, water-resistant formula ensures it stays put through any busy day I have.  The stunning shade truth blends in nicely while adding the perfect shade of deep red to my darker skin tone. There is many shades to choose  from, there's a hue for every mood. truth has become my go-to. Its real results speak volumes. It instantly lights up the skin with a radiant flush making me stand out with the perfect glow. This blush is a holy grail product that earns its place in my makeup collection for the color tone and shine.

Title: Flawless
ReviewText: Another winner from Rare Beauty! The blushes are a very soft, easy to blend, formula, perfect for any skin tone! My usage tips are 1) buy their brush, it blends it much better and more beautifully; and 2) avoid any area of texture. The highlight will make any texture pop, so choose a smooth area of skin (right under eyes where cheeks meet eye area), for a perfectly flattering highlight! Gifted by Rare Beauty.

Title: goes on beautifully but doesn’t last !!
ReviewText: i was so excited for this, i went to three sephoras and they didn’t have it so i ordered it online. it arrived broken, which i should’ve expected bc the highlighters are the same way. i’m extremely fair and i found that this is more buildable than intensely pigmented which i don’t mind, but i wonder how any colors except the deepest two would show up on deep complexions. i have it vvv built up in photo. it also faded extremely fast. a lot of people are mentioning that its texture enhancing but it’s literally a luminous blush, it’s going to pick up on texture. i don’t mind that i just don’t like that it doesn’t last. i usually use a cream underneath so im going to keep it because it’s beautiful while it’s there. if you don’t use creams and are only looking for a powder blush thats punchy and lasts this isn’t it.

This blush is GORGEOUS!! The shine it gives after putting it on your skin is insane. It’s so luxurious, you don’t even need to use highlight because this blush does it for you. Looks so beautiful on the skin ! Gifted by rarebeauty

Title: Beautiful but broken- twice
ReviewText:
Pros:
The product itself is a home run, it’s stunning! I’ve been looking for a glowy blush for a while and have tried many other more expensive brands (Hourglass being one), and this one is the best by far. It’s a true glow without chunky glitter. You can forego highlighter with this,and using a light hand will give you a fresh, natural look. The packaging is just like the highlighters, small, round and dome shaped. Would be easy to travel with (but more on that below). 

Cons:
It’s not the product that’s the issue, it’s the packaging. It’s such a delicate formula it shatters almost without any assistance. In part this can be caused by rough shipping, but in part it is the design of the product also. If it were made into a flat shape vs a dome or pressed more, it would likely have a better chance of survival. I’ve bought 2 rare beauty highlighters and they are my favorite, but they break immediately and therefore you cannot travel with them.  It’s super disappointing because they are AMAZING products but they WILL break.

gifted by rare beauty for review! after loving the powder highlights i knew i would absolutely love this formula too! these have the prettiest baked formula that looks luminous and glowy on the skin. these apply super smooth, i don’t find any chunky shimmer or glitter in the formula.

ReviewText: This blush is okay. It’s extremely soft, and I had trouble opening the compact and when I did, I accidentally jabbed my nail in the product. It’s VERY sheer. I’ve been on a blush kick lately and this on its own doesn’t pack enough punch, and I have incredibly fair skin. I use it as a blush topper, which is nice. Not sure if I’d recommend it, unless you’re wanting something very subtle.

Title: Beautiful blush!
ReviewText: This blush was gifted by rarebeauty and it is beautiful! The application is easy and it blends perfectly. The finish is a perfect glow, not glittery or shimmery. The color is a perfect shade for any skin color. The packaging is cute, and I love that it has a mirror inside the compact.

Title: LOVE!!
ReviewText: I surprisingly found this in store and the wonderful employee was so sweet with everything I picked. This blush is super pigmented and pretty, I ADORE the packaging!!

Title: Total miss/very patchy/too much sparkle
ReviewText: Not a fan of rare beauty blushes because they’re just too pigmented but when i saw a powder version i got so excited! Typically I’m not one for a very glittery blush but the photos/swatches got me. Picked up two shades, love & happy but only tried happy. Immediately there was no color pay off & it was insanely patchy; but at the same time it was super sparkly. This worked more like a highlighter & not a blush. Everything else I’ve tried from rare beauty has been excellent but her blushes are just not it. Returned immediately.

She is recommending me return and purchase Haus Labs instead, so I will be doing that.

Title: Perfect
ReviewText: 😍OMG, what a beautiful and light glow it has and what a beautiful color! It applies perfectly with a brush, blends very softly and does not fall off. Now I want it to have all the colors because it's super quality! Offered by Rarebeauty

Title: Shimmery , more like a  pigmented highlight.
ReviewText: These are very silky to the touch. Very similar to the highlighter formula. These are very luminous too. It appears as if they have fine mica in them, so they do have a somewhat shimmery effect. The pigment is very buildable and the formula blends out quite nice, but like many luminous products, it will emphasize texture if you have large pores . I find these to be really pretty but I wouldn’t use highlighter to top it off. They are almost a blush /highlighter hybrid. So adding highlighter is unnecessary. It Layers well on top the soft pinch liquid blush. Actually, I feel like I like using the soft pinch liquid blush as the pigment/blush and then using this to top off more where highlight would be placed. The color joy is a warm peach. I prefer to use only 1-2 swipes  of this on my lighter skin, perhaps in the summer I could build up the pigment more. The packaging is similar to the highlighters but matte. Love the minimalist aesthetic. In the picture I have a swatch of cheer and joy so you can see what one swipe of color looks light on my light skin with neutral undertones.

I was gifted by Rarebeauty their Blush in the color Joy, and I am obsessed! The blush applies so seamlessly and a little goes a long way. This color is a more orange blush which I love and looks so good on any skin tone. Definitely a new fave product !!
perfect for the dewy blush look! this is great for me cause i’m trying to use less products highlight and blush all in one

Love this shade! I got both Joy and Love and I'd definitely say Joy is more on the subtle side, but if that is what you are looking for then it's great! The mix of the blush and highlighter shows up beautifully on the skin, would definitely recommend for summer. Gifted by rarebeauty

Obsessed with this new blush! The shade is very pigmented so definitely a little goes a long way. It is a perfect summer shade, it sits on the skin beautifully and lasts almost all day, which is rare for a powder blush! Definitely recommend these, you will not regret it! Gifted by Rarebeauty.

Title: To die for!
ReviewText:
This blush is to die for! I have heard such great things about, and it really does not disappoint!! It blends so well onto my cheeks! I love the color happy, it really is just that

Title: Gorgeous, luminous blush
ReviewText: This blush is definitely a luminous blush!! I have the shade “Truth” and it’s a beautiful maroon color. It’s very pigmented and blends beautifully without any streaks. This shade will be perfect for deeper skin tones in my opinion. I’m tanned skin and on me it looks like a light mauvish/burgundy shade. It’s pretty long wearing too and gives the skin such a pretty flush of color with added luminosity! Gifted by Rare Beauty.

I'm absolutely obsessed with this blush! The color payoff is incredible, and it's so easy to apply. It gives my cheeks a perfect pop of color that looks so natural and lasts all day. It's definitely a staple product in my makeup routine. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a new blush to try! Gifted by rarebeauty.

Title: So pretty
ReviewText: Gifted by Rare Beauty, This luminous powder blush is so beautiful. I got the shade happy, and it’s the perfect shade of pink for my complexion. I thought it would emphasize my texture and pores because I have oily and textured skin, but it didn’t. I was actually very surprised and I’m Waiting for the Sephora sale to pick up another color!

Offered by A radiant blush that lights up all skin tones with airy, seamless, and silky color to keep you beaming all day. This is mixing the blush and highlighter and making a baby. I love this so much and it looks beautiful on skin.

gifted by rare beauty - Even though this is marketed as a blush, I think it is a great mix between a highlighter and blush. It has the same performance as the liquid blush but is easier to build. However, the product is sensitive so be careful when transporting!

ReviewText: Rare Beauty gifted me their new powder blush in the shade “Joy” and I’m obsessed with the finish! It’s a beautiful muted peach color and is extremely easy to apply. It’s pigmented and you’ll only need a few taps to see great results.

ReviewText: What a gorgeous blush! It’s so smooth and silky to the touch and is beautiful on the cheeks. It has a slight shimmery finish but it doesn’t enhance my texture at all. I have the shade Truth and it’s a beautiful mauve that is beautiful for both light and darker skin tones. This was gifted by Rare Beauty.

Title: Back to the basics! Powder blush for the win
ReviewText:
#rarebeautygiftedme As soon as I received the Soft Pinch Blush a week ago, I incorporated it into my everyday routine. I gave myself a week of use to really get a sense of the wearability and practicality of it.

After one week of daily use, I can tell you that this blush is something I will continue to reach for. It is easily blendable and buildable but does not fade away throughout the day like many other formulas I have tried. It also has this slight radiant finish that I LOVE!! I’ve previously only used matte blush formulas but I’m loving the sun-kissed look the radiance gives. It works wonderfully with a full face of foundation AND when I just want to throw some blush on over a bare face. I have a medium olive skin tone and normally reach for lighter pink shades, so I was a little nervous to try this peachy shade but it did not disappoint at all!!! The shade truly works on many skin types (I tried it on my sister who has a more fair complexion and my best friend who has a deeper complexion). When I am wearing full foundation, I use the Rare Beauty liquid blush version (in the same shade) and then pair the powder version on top once I’ve applied all my powders. They work so beautifully together but can also be used separately. For example, when it’s a bare face day, I use just the powder and it lasts me all day!! 10/10 recommend, can’t wait to try out the other shades!!

Title: Glowy !
ReviewText: Gifted by Rare Beauty. This is my real and honest opinion when I saw this color I wasn’t really sure what to expect it because it does look dark I have medium skin tone, and when I tell you this blended in so beautiful, and they just gave me a beautiful and natural glow I was obsessed.

ReviewText: I received 2 shades, Hope & Joy. So far my experience with each has been different lol. In this review I’m showcasing the shade Hope. I found this shade to lack actual pigmentation. Title: So so beautiful
ReviewText:
Wow this is so beautiful! It’s a glowy shimmery blush in Joy, it’s soft peachy and so pretty. The formula is very silky smooth and easy to blend onto the skin. Starts with a sheer coat and the intensity can be built up nicely as well.
*gifted by rarebeauty

Title: So gorgeous
ReviewText:
These new rare beauty soft pinch luminous powder blushes are stunning! The perfect blend of shimmery highlights into a blush for a gorgeous summer day.
The shade truth is the most pigmentation of them all.
*gifted by rarebeauty

I was gifted by rarebeauty in exchange for an honest review and Im loving this new blush! I love the idea of making it luminous because its really 2 in 1 ! You get a highlight and blush with this product, i love the formula, its so soft and buttery, only downside is how fragile they are

Title: So beautiful!
ReviewText: I picked the perfect color for my tan/deep skin tone. Happy is perfect for the rosy cheek blush vibe. I love this formula the sheen on my cheekbones is not tooo blinding. It did not bring out too much texture to my pores so 10/10. Gifted by rare beauty

Title: perfect peachy glow!
ReviewText: this is the PERFECT product for adding a little glow to my cheeks!! you can lightly tap it on your cheeks for a subtle warm glow or you can layer it on top of a liquid blush for an even more intense pop of color! this is such a fun new product to add to my rare beauty faves ✨🤍 gifted by rare beauty

Title: RASH! (I do NOT have sensitive skin)
ReviewText: I tried this on in the store and, within ten minutes, my skin was broken out in rash and burned. Fun! Maybe they were going for a natural flush look? Also had chunkkky glitter like you’d see in a little kids makeup kit.

Title: Lots of shimmer-more shimmer than color
ReviewText: It barely shows up on you and has a lot of shimmer which is not advertised. Likely returning and sticking too liquid blush. This would be nice as a highlighter if that’s what you are looking for.

Gifted by rare beauty! This product is stunning. I was shocked as to how vibrant these applied on the face! I used this over the liquid blush happy and it looked so gorgeous. It also isn’t too much of a glow!

Title: Amazing!
ReviewText: This blush is super pretty when you put it on and I am literally obsessed. It is the right amount of a glowing and blushy! This product was gifted by rare beauty and I am in love. I recommend everyone try it!

Title: A must have in my makeup routine
ReviewText: Rare Beauty's New Soft Pinch Luminous Powder Blush in the shade Joy, gifted to me by the brand, is an absolute gem! Its silky texture effortlessly glides onto the skin, delivering a natural flush of color and radiant glow. The Joy shade strikes the perfect balance between pink and peach, providing a healthy and luminous look to my skin. Moreover, the pigmentation is excellent yet buildable, allowing for customizable intensity. It has definitely become a staple in my makeup routine!

Title: Coral vibes
ReviewText: This has been my favorite blush ever, so luminous, radiant and natural, love the coral pigment it leaves on skin, a packaging that fit anywhere and comes with the mirror, love that it gives you the result you decide to wear either too light or very well pronounced. Gifted by rare beauty

Title: Perfect luminous flushed cheeks
ReviewText: Im Amazed at the glowy luminous blush gifted by Rare Beauty and Joe it just makes my cheeks pigmented and glow and luminous. It has a buildable formula which is fantastic and a silky and weightless texture to it that makes it so easy to blend. It definitely long lasting and I wouldn’t expect less from Rare Beauty. My cheeks look flushed in a beautiful way. I dab a couple dots then blend into my cheeks for the perfect application. Overall this is a winner and very highly recommended

This is the absolute best. The way it made my cheeks look so good! I will never want a different blush! A little goes a long way so this lasts! And it’s so pretty and makes you glow. Go and get this now! It was gifted by rare beauty for an honest review and now I’m going to go buy more!

Title: My new favorite blush for spring!
ReviewText: The luminous powder blush is stunning! The color joy is such a nice peach! I love this it is able to be sheered out for a soft touch of color or built up for more of a pop! I’ve been loving it layered on top of the liquid blushes. This product was gifted to me by rare beauty for my honest review.

Title: Beautiful
ReviewText: Beautiful. I love layering this on top of the liquid blush, it’s so pigmented it barely takes any product but it gives such a gorgeous color and shine it kind of serves as a highlighter too. Truly love it. Gifted by rarebeauty!

I was so excited to try this blush! I tried the shade hope and it is absolutely beautiful. I have light skin with cool undertones, and this was a great choice for my complexion. Love the shimmer in the product, because it’s not chunky like glitter, and it lasts all day.

The pigmentation with this blush is reallll. Just one swipe of testing this blush out gives so much payoff. I got Truth which is a beautiful mauve color that will never perfect for all seasons. I can’t wait to layer this on top of liquid blush! I was gifted by rare beauty.

Title: SO PRETTY
ReviewText: wow this is such a gorgeous shade and the highlight is not to much compared to the blush and it looks amazing with Rare Beauty’s cream blush as well! i 1000% recommend this if you want a pretty glow

Title: Gorgeous natural glow flush
ReviewText: I layered this on top of the happy liquid blush & it looked absolutely stunning, took it up a notch. It looks just as beautiful alone, leaves such a healthy flushed glow. I do have to mention that I have textured skin on my upper cheek area & it really accentuated it without some product underneath. But I still love it!! The pink is so natural looking on the skin.

I love a dewy, radiant blush so I was very excited to see that rare beauty came out with a powder blush with shimmer. I tried shade joy, and it was very beautiful, however, I would not be able to wear the shade due to how fair and cool my skin tone is.

This is my new go to blush omg! I was worried because I don’t like peach orange or brown colored blush. But this orange color really isn’t orange at all. On my skin tone, it gives me a natural sun burn look! Also this is shiny but not glittery. So it def feels like a blush and highlighter and contour all in one! Lasted ALL day without a primer. This product was gifted by rarebeauty.

This was gifted by Rare Beauty. This blush is so amazing! It’s the perfect blend between the blush and highlighter and is the perfect product to keep in your purse for touch ups or easy makeup looks. Love!

Title: My favorite one
ReviewText: I’m obsessed with this blush!!! The application is so smooth, and blends out really well and very easily. I've tried to bring this product by hand and with a brush and the results are great using both, in comparison to other luminous blushes the texture of this one is very smooth almost like a creamy powder. It’s the perfect mix of highlighter and blush that makes beautiful luminous color for my cheeks. I’m so glad I received this product gifted by Rare Beauty! Now it’s my favorite one from the brand!

Title: Beautiful
ReviewText: I was gifted by rarebeauty this blush & I am completely obsessed! It’s the perfect shade & is so glowy as well. Can definitely duo as a blush & highlighter. I love using this for full glam & adding it on top of my liquid rarebeauty blush as well.

Title: Beautiful Formula
ReviewText: Amazing formula! I absolutely love this podwer blush. It literally blends into your skin so beautifully and lasts a really long time on the skin. This product was offered by rarebeauty in exchange of my honest review!

Title: Not a soul can clock this blush! ✨
ReviewText: IN LOVE WITH THESE! 💖Perfect for no-makeup makeup or heavier applications, looks like skin is blushing from within. The shimmer inside is round enough to hide texture. Selena really did that!

Gifted by Rare Beauty. Ahhh rare beauty is back with an amazing product. So this shade truth I initially thought was not going to be my shade but it looks beautiful. You just need a tiny amount on the brush and it gives you pigment and shine. So beautiful

Title: Pigmented and pretty!
ReviewText: Super pretty and very pigmented, I loved the way it is super blend able and I didn’t have to use a lot. I got the Truth shade and it was definitely more wine/plum than my usual shades as well as very glimmery/has a metallic sheen but I loved how it looked on my face. I wore it for our spring family pictures and it helped me look no so washed out which I love! Gifted by rare beauty

ReviewText: This blush is so aptly named because of the amount of cheer it brings me is insane. She’s the perfect just pinched cheeks shade, with the I drink 8 glasses of water a day glow. Fortunately it’s like an ethereal, candle lit glow too. Not a glittery make my pores look massive glow. Gifted by rare beauty.

This product was gifted by rare beauty! I love this product so much the pigment is so pretty and you really only need one drop so the product goes a long way and you don’t have to repurchase. The packaging is so aesthetic and is so pretty on display too.

This was gifted by Rare Beauty. This blush is just amazing!!! I didn’t think I could love anything more than their liquid blush, but this stuff is so nice! It’s buildable so you can do a sheer color or some more pigmented looks!

Title: Blush and highlight in one!
ReviewText: Rare Beauty gifted me this product! The powder blush is SO pigmented that you only need one swipe of it on your cheeks. It blends so nice too and stays on the face for so long that you do not need to reapply! it gives you a highlight glow so you don’t even need to put another highlighter on!
